hidden_abilites: When HP is under 30%, immune against all decrease skills (frost, druid vine, Lich paralyze, etc.).
Move quickly (dash) to the first attack target and engage in battle quickly.
Increase HP and defense of all units by 10%.
description.skill2: Increase HP of human unit in Guild War (3%, 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Golem ]
